articles.title: Mighty Goose offers the perfect video game trailer - Polygon
articles.description: Mighty Goose is a side-scrolling shooter a la Meta Slug. But instead of tiny fighters, you’re a big goose with big, red armor. The trailer for Might Goose is very silly, and worth a watch no matter how invested you are in games like Metal Slug.
articles.content: Mighty Goose is out now, thank god
